List datasets from full-text search

Source: R/db.R
db_search.Rd

List datasets from full-text search

Usage

db_search(query)

Arguments

query

character(1) full-text search.

Examples

# \donttest{
db_search("GDP France")
#> # A tibble: 10 × 9
